body: @kcjpunk lol, I made a little cuck angry just by telling my opinion on this shit, also why don't you try using some punctuation? Not that adding punctuation would actually improve the bs you wrote, you dunce.
Why don't the boy should just run away lol but it's hentai so

This is one of the few doujin I genuinely hate and regret reading, i read all the chapters and every time it only got worse, under the first chapter i wrote that the art was good and it objectively is but that's the only good thing about this and it doesn't make it worth reading.
The boy should just have Run. :x
